description: English vocabulary words with corresponding Cantonese word, English sentence, Cantonese sentence, and image file names

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am happy to see you.
I am angry that you stepped on my favourite potato chips.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很嬲因為你踩到我最喜歡的薯片。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am sad that I finished the cake.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很傷心因為我吃完了蛋糕。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am tired after eating lots of snacks.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 吃了很多零食後我很累。

lessonWords.englishSentence: The Cookie Monster makes me scared.
I am energetic whenever I see a table full of food!
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 每當我看到裝滿食物的桌子時，我就會充滿活力！

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am jealous that your lunch is bigger than mine.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很妒忌你的午餐比我的大。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am annoyed that these candies aren't on sale today.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很忟這些糖果今天不銷售。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am confused why this cake looks so much like me.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很迷茫為什麼這個蛋糕看起來很像我。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am bored because I have no snacks to eat.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很悶因為我沒有零食吃。
